title: Antik's Cartoon Sketchbook (A4)
description: Premium 200-page sketchbook with thick, bleed-proof paper. Perfect for cartoon drawing practice. Features Antik's exclusive cover art.

title: Digital Drawing Tablet Starter Kit
description: Entry-level drawing tablet bundle with pen, nibs, and glove. Compatible with all major drawing software. Great for beginners!

title: Cartoon Character T-Shirt (Unisex)
description: 100% cotton t-shirt featuring Antik's most popular cartoon character. Available in S, M, L, XL sizes. Machine washable.

title: Professional Marker Set (24 Colors)
description: Dual-tip alcohol-based markers perfect for cartoon coloring. Vibrant, blendable colors with both fine and broad tips.

title: Calligraphy Pen Set (Bangla Special)
description: Handcrafted calligraphy pen set with 6 nibs designed specifically for Bangla script. Includes ink bottle and practice guide.

title: Antik Cartoon Sticker Pack (50pcs)
description: Vinyl waterproof stickers featuring 50 unique cartoon characters by Antik. Perfect for laptops, water bottles, and notebooks.
